00035 AssemblyDataFrame::AssemblyDataFrame(wxWindow* parent,wxWindowID id)
00036 {
00037         Create(parent, id, wxT("Objekt-Eigenschaften"), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxCAPTION|wxSYSTEM_MENU|wxCLOSE_BOX|wxMINIMIZE_BOX|wxSTATIC_BORDER, _T("id"));
00038         MakeModal();
00039         SetClientSize(wxSize(350, 300));
00040         SetBackgroundColour(wxNullColour);
00041         SetIcon(wxICON(_ICON));
00042 
00043         m_stxName = new wxStaticText(this, -1, wxT("Name:"), wxPoint(30,34), wxSize(80,22), 0);
00044         m_txcName = new wxTextCtrl(this, idtxcName, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,30), wxSize(150,22), 0, wxDefaultValidator);
00045 
00046         m_stxWidth = new wxStaticText(this, -1, wxT("Breite (mm):"), wxPoint(30,84), wxSize(80,22), 0);
00047         //m_txcWidth = new wxTextCtrl(this, idtxcWidth, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,80), wxSize(150,22), 0, wxTextValidator(wxFILTER_NUMERIC));
00048         m_txcWidth = new wxSpinCtrl(this, idSpcWidth, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,80), wxSize(150,22), wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER, SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE, SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE, SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE);
00049 
00050         m_stxHeight = new wxStaticText(this, -1, wxT("Höhe (mm):"), wxPoint(30,114), wxSize(80,22), 0);
00051         //m_txcHeight = new wxTextCtrl(this, idtxcHeight, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,110), wxSize(150,22), 0, wxTextValidator(wxFILTER_NUMERIC));
00052         m_txcHeight = new wxSpinCtrl(this, idSpcHeight, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,110), wxSize(150,22), wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER, SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE, SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE, SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE);
00053 
00054         m_stxDepth = new wxStaticText(this, -1, wxT("Tiefe (mm):"), wxPoint(30,144), wxSize(80,22), 0);
00055         //m_txcDepth = new wxTextCtrl(this, idtxcDepth, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,140), wxSize(150,22), 0, wxTextValidator(wxFILTER_NUMERIC));
00056         m_txcDepth = new wxSpinCtrl(this, idSpcDepth, wxT(""), wxPoint(120,140), wxSize(150,22), wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER, SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE, SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE, SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE);
00057 
00058         m_cbxProportion = new wxCheckBox(this, idcbxProportion, wxT("Proportionen beibehalten"), wxPoint(120, 170), wxSize(160, 22));
00059         m_cbxProportion->SetValue(true);
00060 
00061         m_stxVisible = new wxStaticText(this, -1, wxT("Sichtbar:"), wxPoint(30,212), wxSize(80,22), 0);
00062         m_cbxVisible = new wxCheckBox(this, idcbxVisible, wxEmptyString, wxPoint(120, 210), wxSize(80, 22));
00063 
00064         m_btnChange  = new wxButton(this, idBtnChange, wxT("Ändern"), wxPoint(70,255), wxDefaultSize, 0);
00065         m_btnCancel  = new wxButton(this, idBtnCancel, wxT("Abbrechen"), wxPoint(190,255), wxDefaultSize, 0);
00066 
00067         // connects m_spcWidth with OnSpcWidthChange
00068         Connect(idSpcWidth,wxEVT_COMMAND_SPINCTRL_UPDATED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&AssemblyDataFrame::OnWidthChange);
00069 
00070         // connects m_spcDepth with OnSpcDepthChange
00071         Connect(idSpcDepth,wxEVT_COMMAND_SPINCTRL_UPDATED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&AssemblyDataFrame::OnDepthChange);
00072 
00073         // connects m_spcHeight with OnSpcHeightChange
00074         Connect(idSpcHeight,wxEVT_COMMAND_SPINCTRL_UPDATED,(wxObjectEventFunction)&AssemblyDataFrame::OnHeightChange);
00075 
00076         // connects m_spcWidth with OnSpcWidthChange on press Enter
00077         Connect(idSpcWidth,wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER,(wxObjectEventFunction)&AssemblyDataFrame::OnWidthChange);
00078 
00079         // connects m_spcDepth with OnSpcDepthChange on press Enter
00080         Connect(idSpcDepth,wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER,(wxObjectEventFunction)&AssemblyDataFrame::OnDepthChange);
00081

00091 void AssemblyDataFrame::fillFields(Assembly* assembly)
00092 {
00093         m_assembly = assembly;
00094 
00095         wxString str;
00096 
00097         m_txcName->ChangeValue(assembly->getName());
00098 
00099         m_txcWidth->SetValue((int)(assembly->getWidth()*assembly->getScaleX()*1000));
00100         m_txcHeight->SetValue((int)(assembly->getHeight()*assembly->getScaleY()*1000));
00101         m_txcDepth->SetValue((int)(assembly->getDepth()*assembly->getScaleZ()*1000));
00102 
00103         m_cbxVisible->SetValue(m_assembly->isVisible());
00104 
00105         m_assemblyWidth  = (int)(assembly->getWidth()  * 1000);
00106         m_assemblyHeight = (int)(assembly->getHeight() * 1000);
00107         m_assemblyDepth  = (int)(assembly->getDepth()  * 1000);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void AssemblyDataFrame::OnChange(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00111 {
00112         m_assembly->setName(m_txcName->GetValue());
00113 
00114         float factor = (float)m_txcWidth->GetValue() / m_assemblyWidth;
00115         m_assembly->setScaleX(factor);
00116 
00117         //fix for keeping bottom of object on same level
00118         float old_h = m_assembly->getHeightMeters();
00119         float old_y = m_assembly->getY();
00120 
00121         //calculate new scale
00122         factor = (float)m_txcHeight->GetValue() / m_assemblyHeight;
00123         m_assembly->setScaleY(factor);
00124 
00125         //now correct y-level of center
00126         m_assembly->setY(old_y+(m_assembly->getHeightMeters()-old_h)/2.0);
00127 
00128         factor = (float)m_txcDepth->GetValue() / m_assemblyDepth;
00129         m_assembly->setScaleZ(factor);
00130 
00131         m_assembly->setVisible(m_cbxVisible->IsChecked());
00132 
00133         // send event to refresh canvas
00134         NotifyEvent myevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00135         myevent.setGNREventType(GLREFRESH);
00136         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00137         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(myevent);
00138 
00139         // send event to refresh tree
00140         myevent.setGNREventType(REFRESHSCENETREE);
00141         myevent.SetEventObject(this);
00142         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(myevent);
00143 
00144         MakeModal(false);
00145         Destroy();
00146 }
00147 
00148 void AssemblyDataFrame::OnCancel(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00149 {
00150         MakeModal(false);
00151         Destroy();
00152 }

00154 void AssemblyDataFrame::OnClose(wxCloseEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00155 {
00156         MakeModal(false);
00157         Destroy();
00158 }

00160 void AssemblyDataFrame::OnWidthChange(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00161 {
00162         if (m_cbxProportion->IsChecked() == true)
00163         {
00164                 float width = m_txcWidth->GetValue();
00165 
00166                 if (width >= SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE)
00167                 {
00168                         width = SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE;
00169                 }
00170                 else if (width <= SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE)
00171                 {
00172                         width = SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE;
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 int n_height = (int)((width / m_assemblyWidth) * m_assemblyHeight);
00176                 int n_depth  = (int)((width / m_assemblyWidth) * m_assemblyDepth);
00177 
00178                 m_txcHeight->SetValue(n_height);
00179                 m_txcDepth->SetValue(n_depth);
00180         }
00181 }
00182 
00183 void AssemblyDataFrame::OnHeightChange(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00184 {
00185         if (m_cbxProportion->IsChecked() == true)
00186         {
00187                 float height = m_txcHeight->GetValue();
00188 
00189                 if (height >= SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE)
00190                 {
00191                         height = SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE;
00192                 }
00193                 else if (height <= SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE)
00194                 {
00195                         height = SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE;
00196                 }
00197 
00198                 int n_width  = (int)((height / m_assemblyHeight) * m_assemblyWidth);
00199                 int n_depth  = (int)((height / m_assemblyHeight) * m_assemblyDepth);
00200 
00201                 m_txcWidth->SetValue(n_width);
00202                 m_txcDepth->SetValue(n_depth);
00203         }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void AssemblyDataFrame::OnDepthChange(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00207 {
00208         if (m_cbxProportion->IsChecked() == true)
00209         {
00210                 float depth = m_txcDepth->GetValue();
00211 
00212                 if (depth >= SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE)
00213                 {
00214                         depth = SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE;
00215                 }
00216                 else if (depth <= SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE)
00217                 {
00218                         depth = SIZE_MINIMUM_VALUE;
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 int n_width  = (int)((depth / m_assemblyDepth) * m_assemblyWidth);
00222                 int n_height = (int)((depth / m_assemblyDepth) * m_assemblyHeight);
00223 
00224                 m_txcWidth->SetValue(n_width);
00225                 m_txcHeight->SetValue(n_height);
00226         }
00227 }
